Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Beastmaster Dedication: Has the Animal Companion and Call Companion features
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
Fighter Feats: Class Feats (Choose 3 from any)
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Fighter Weapon Mastery: 1 selection
General Feats: General Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Incredible Beastmaster Companion: Has the Incredible Companion feature
Mature Beastmaster Companion: Has the Mature Animal Companion feature
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Specialized Beastmaster Companion: Has the Specialized Companion feature
Additional Companion: Has 1 additional young animal companion
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion
Beastmaster Bond: Can communicate telepathically with animal companions within 100'
Call Companion: 1 min process makes a different animal companion active
Incredible Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of nimble or savage characteristics
Mature Animal Companion: Animal Companion is a mature companion and can Stride or Strike without a command
Specialized Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of specialization
Perception: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +8 (dexterity; trained) Deception: +10 (charisma; trained) Religion: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Arcana: +5 (intelligence; untrained) Diplomacy: +10 (charisma; trained) River Lore: +12 (intelligence; expert)
Art Lore: +10 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +10 (charisma; trained) Society: +10 (intelligence; trained)
Astronomy Lore: +10 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +8 (wisdom; trained) Stealth: +8 (dexterity; trained)
Athletics: +10 (strength; trained) Nature: +8 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +8 (wisdom; trained)
Cooking Lore: +12 (intelligence; expert) Occultism: +5 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +3 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +5 (intelligence; untrained) Performance: +5 (charisma; untrained)

Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +4 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Acrobatics): Can take an automatic 17 on Acrobatics checks
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 23 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Bola (+10 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Lance (+12 1d8+3 P [Crit +d8]; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+12 1d6+3 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Swords): Attack Master (Simple Swords; Martial Swords)/Attack Expert (Advanced Swords)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Pick): Weapon Familiarity (Pick)
Beastmaster's Call: (1) R30' Conjures an image of an inactive animal companion to provide support once per turn
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Lead The Pack: Can have 2 animal companions active simultaneously; Command An Animal allows each to take 1 action or one of them to take 2 actions
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Swift Guardian: (F) Uses Call Companion during initiative
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Magic
Focus Points: 1 Attack: Primal: +10 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal: 20 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Beastmaster Trance (P3 Foc): (3) Allows self to use the senses of an animal companion up to 1 mile away, inflicting off-guard on self, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 6th allows speaking to the companion and extends the range to 100 miles and the maximum duration to 10 min; 8th allows telepathic communication and extends the range to planetary and the maximum duration to 1 hr)
Magic Notes: Beastmaster's Trance: Spell Trained (Primal)/Knows the Beastmaster Trance primal spell/Has a focus pool
Notes
Validation Errors:
Beastmaster Bond Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 10 and beastmaster dedication feature (currently 1)
Beastmaster's Call Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, beastmaster dedication feature (currently 1) and call companion feature (currently 1)
Beastmaster's Trance Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and beastmaster dedication feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 3 available vs. 10 allocated
Incredible Beastmaster Companion Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and mature beastmaster companion feature (currently 1)
Lead The Pack Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 16 and mature beastmaster companion feature (currently 1)
Specialized Beastmaster Companion Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 14 and incredible beastmaster companion feature (currently 1)
Swift Guardian Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6, beastmaster dedication feature (currently 1) and call companion feature (currently 1)
